duties_responsibilities.duty: Setting up, operating, monitoring, troubleshooting, and performing preventive maintenance on assigned machines.
Inspecting parts to specifications and making adjustments or tool changes as necessary to maintain quality specifications.
Reading and interpreting blueprints and diagrams to select, position, and secure machinery.
Performing necessary pre-operation activities to ensure proper equipment startup and operation.
Operating and monitoring multiple pieces of equipment during operation to ensure quality production and minimal unplanned stops.
Inspecting product for defects, reprocessing, and repair along with wrapping and attaching product identification tags.
Performing general housekeeping of floors, machinery, and other areas as needed.

education_certification.credential: Minimum of 1 year of experience as a Machine Operator
